tool_description: Tracks individual inventory items with detailed product information, quantities, and current storage locations.

sku.description: Stock Keeping Unit identifier for the product

bin_id.description: Current storage bin identifier where items are located

batch_number.description: Production batch or lot number for traceability

expiry_date.description: Product expiration date in ISO 8601 format

error_messages: Invalid sku: SKU must be a non-empty string and should follow company SKU format.
Invalid quantity: Quantity must be a positive integer greater than 0.
Invalid bin_id: Bin must exist and be accessible for storage.
Invalid expiry_date: Must be a valid ISO 8601 date-time string and cannot be in the past for new inventory.
usage: Provide sku, product_name, quantity, and bin_id to track inventory items. Optionally include batch_number and expiry_date for enhanced traceability.

tracking_id.description: Generated unique tracking identifier for this inventory record

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the item was registered

status.description: Current item status (in_stock, reserved, expired, damaged)
